description: Lebanese traveling to Portugal (Apply for visa offline)

messages.content: Hello, I'm planning a trip from to Portugal. Can you help me with the visa requirements?
Of course! Could you please specify your passport issuer so I can assist you better with your journey?

Thank you for the information. For your journey to Portugal, Lebanese passport holders will need to apply for a visa in advance at a Portuguese consulate - there are no visa on arrival or visa exemptions.
Hello, I'm planning a trip from to Portugal. Can you help me with the visa requirements?
Of course! Could you please specify your passport issuer so I can assist you better with your journey?
Thank you for the information. Singaporean passport holders are exempt from visa for travel to Portugal with a maximum stay of 30 days.

description: Cypriot traveling to Portugal (Visa on Arrival)

messages.content: Hello, I'm planning a trip from to Portugal. Can you help me with the visa requirements?
Of course! Could you please specify your passport issuer so I can assist you better with your journey?
Thank you for the information. For your journey to Portugal, Cypriot passport holders can obtain a visa upon arrival which will give you 90-day maximum stay.

description: Icelander traveling to Singapore (Apply for visa offline)

messages.content: Hi, I need help determining the visa requirements to Singapore.
Sure! Please upload a photo of your passport so I can assist you with the visa information.

Thank you for providing the passport image. For your journey to Singapore, Iceland passport holders will need to apply for a visa in advance at a Singapore consulate - there are no visa on arrival or visa exemptions.
